text:
Customer called due was not possible to engage C/L and VIBRATION.
From IOS found the message "MCL PC NOT RUNNING" 
From MCL was not posible reset the error message. 
Reloaded MCL node but the issue was the same. 
Reloaded CORE SIMULATION and MCL node to solve.
author: Fabrizio
title: A109 MCL ISSUE

text:
Customer called because a list of numbers appeared on central MFD preventing the crew from reading ENG values.
Reloaded "Avionic" and "Display" nodes to solve.
author: Aharon
title: AW169 MFD avionic fault.
